name: PlayMe
description:
This game is made within 72 hours for BGDJam 2021 with the theme of Recursion.

This game caught your attention and you decided to give it a try. You don't know what the game is about. The only thing that you know is that you're being forced to play the game. Forever. Like opening an endless matryoshka doll.

Credits:
Game Designer - Enoxmyth
Programmer - Enoxmyth
2D Artist - Enoxmyth
Simple Piano Music - Enoxmyth

This game contains these free-to-use sound assets:
4c Iced Tea by Origami Repetika (from https://freemusicarchive.org)
Game Level Music provided by Mixkit.co
Various sound effects provided by Mixkit.co
